message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $950000. I'm willing to go up to $980000. Can we meet at this price?

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. However, $980000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a living. I'm counteroffering at $1020000. This is my best and final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I understand you're trying to make a living, but I'm still a bit above $990000. I'm willing to meet you at $995000. Can we finalize the deal at this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you at $998000, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
